016package org.lifstools.jmzqc;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude.Include;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonFactoryBuilder;
020import java.io.IOException;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.*;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.json.JsonReadFeature;
026import com.networknt.schema.JsonSchema;
027import com.networknt.schema.JsonSchemaFactory;
028import com.networknt.schema.SchemaValidatorsConfig;
029import com.networknt.schema.SpecVersion;
030import com.networknt.schema.ValidationMessage;
031import java.io.File;
032import java.io.InputStream;
033import java.net.MalformedURLException;
034import java.net.URL;
035import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
036import java.nio.file.Files;
037import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
038import java.time.OffsetDateTime;
039import java.time.OffsetTime;
040import java.time.ZoneOffset;
041import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
042import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
043import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder;
044import java.time.temporal.ChronoField;
045import java.util.List;
046import java.util.Set;
047
048/**
049 * Provides convenience functions to parse date and time strings and to
050 * serialize and deserialize mzQC from and to a variety of sources.
051 */
052public class Converter {
053    // Date-time helpers
054
055    private static final DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME_FORMATTER = new DateTimeFormatterBuilder()
056            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_DATE_TIME)
057            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME)
058            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_INSTANT)
059            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SX"))
060            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssX"))
061            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"))
062            .toFormatter()
063            .withZone(ZoneOffset.UTC);
064
065    /**
066     * Parse a date and time string using the default date and time formatter.
067     *
068     * @param str the date time string
069     * @return an {@link OffsetDateTime} object.
070     */
071    public static OffsetDateTime parseDateTimeString(String str) {
072        return ZonedDateTime.from(Converter.DATE_TIME_FORMATTER.parse(str)).toOffsetDateTime();
073    }
074
075    private static final DateTimeFormatter TIME_FORMATTER = new DateTimeFormatterBuilder()
076            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_TIME)
077            .appendOptional(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_OFFSET_TIME)
078            .parseDefaulting(ChronoField.YEAR, 2020)
079            .parseDefaulting(ChronoField.MONTH_OF_YEAR, 1)
080            .parseDefaulting(ChronoField.DAY_OF_MONTH, 1)
081            .toFormatter()
082            .withZone(ZoneOffset.UTC);
083
084    /**
085     * Parse a time string using the default time formatter.
086     *
087     * @param str the time string
088     * @return an {@link OffsetTime} object.
089     */
090    public static OffsetTime parseTimeString(String str) {
091        return ZonedDateTime.from(Converter.TIME_FORMATTER.parse(str)).toOffsetDateTime().toOffsetTime();
092    }
093    // Serialize/deserialize helpers
094
095    /**
096     * Return a Coordinate holding an MzQC object from a file.
097     *
098     * @param file the file containing the mzQC json data.
099     * @return {@link Coordinate} holding the MzQC object.
100     * @throws IOException
101     */
102    public static MzQC of(File file) throws IOException {
103        return of(Files.readString(file.toPath(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
104    }
105
106    /**
107     * Return a Coordinate holding an MzQC object from a URL.
108     *
109     * @param url the url from where to load the mzQC json data.
110     * @return {@link Coordinate} holding the MzQC object.
111     * @throws IOException
112     */
113    public static MzQC of(URL url) throws IOException {
114        try ( InputStream in = url.openStream()) {
115            byte[] bytes = in.readAllBytes();
116            return of(new String(bytes, StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
117        }
118    }
119
120    /**
121     * Return a Coordinate holding an MzQC object from a string holding the JSON
122     * representation of an mzQC data.
123     *
124     * @param json the string containing the mzQC json data.
125     * @return {@link Coordinate} holding the MzQC object.
126     * @throws IOException
127     */
128    public static MzQC of(String json) throws IOException {
129        return ((Coordinate) getObjectReader().readValue(json)).mzQC();
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * Validate a mzQC JSON string.
134     *
135     * @param json the mzQC data in JSON format.
136     * @return a set of validation messages.
137     * @throws JsonProcessingException if the JSON is malformed.
138     */
139    public static Set<ValidationMessage> validate(String json) throws JsonProcessingException {
140        return defaultSchema().validate(getObjectReader().readTree(json));
141    }
142
143    /**
144     * Validate a mzQC Object.
145     *
146     * @param mzQc the mzQC object.
147     * @return a set of validation messages.
148     * @throws JsonProcessingException if the JSON is malformed.
149     */
150    public static Set<ValidationMessage> validate(MzQC mzQc) throws JsonProcessingException {
151        return defaultSchema().validate(getObjectReader().readTree(Converter.toJsonString(mzQc)));
152    }
153
154    /**
155     * Validate a mzQC JSON file.
156     *
157     * @param file the mzQC data file in JSON format.
158     * @return a set of validation messages.
159     * @throws JsonProcessingException if the JSON is malformed.
160     */
161    public static Set<ValidationMessage> validate(File file) throws JsonProcessingException, IOException {
162        return defaultSchema().validate(getObjectReader().readTree(Files.readString(file.toPath(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8)));
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Validate a mzQC JSON URL.
167     *
168     * @param url the url to read mzQC data in JSON format from.
169     * @return a set of validation messages.
170     * @throws JsonProcessingException if the JSON is malformed.
171     */
172    public static Set<ValidationMessage> validate(URL url) throws JsonProcessingException, IOException {
173        try ( InputStream is = url.openStream()) {
174            return defaultSchema().validate(getObjectReader().readTree(is));
175        }
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * Serialize the MzQC object to a JSON string.
180     *
181     * @param obj the MzQC object
182     * @return an (unformatted) JSON string representation.
183     * @throws JsonProcessingException
184     */
185    public static String toJsonString(MzQC obj) throws JsonProcessingException {
186        return getObjectWriter().writeValueAsString(new Coordinate(obj));
187    }
188
189    /**
190     * Serialize the MzQC object to a file containing the data as a JSON string.
191     *
192     * @param obj the MzQC object
193     * @param file the file to write to
194     * @return an (unformatted) JSON string representation.
195     * @throws JsonProcessingException
196     */
197    public static File toJsonFile(MzQC obj, File file) throws JsonProcessingException, IOException {
198        return Files.writeString(file.toPath(), toJsonString(obj), StandardCharsets.UTF_8, StandardOpenOption.CREATE, StandardOpenOption.TRUNCATE_EXISTING).toFile();
199    }
200
201    private static ObjectReader reader;
202    private static ObjectWriter writer;
203
204    private static void instantiateMapper() {
205        JsonFactoryBuilder jfb = new JsonFactoryBuilder().
206                enable(JsonReadFeature.ALLOW_TRAILING_COMMA);
207        ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper(jfb.build());
208        mapper.findAndRegisterModules();
209        mapper.configure(SerializationFeature.WRITE_DATES_AS_TIMESTAMPS, false);
210        mapper.configure(SerializationFeature.INDENT_OUTPUT, true);
211        mapper.configure(JsonParser.Feature.ALLOW_COMMENTS, true);
212        mapper.setSerializationInclusion(Include.NON_EMPTY);
213        SimpleModule module = new SimpleModule();
214        module.addDeserializer(OffsetDateTime.class, new JsonDeserializer<OffsetDateTime>() {
215            @Override
216            public OffsetDateTime deserialize(JsonParser jsonParser, DeserializationContext deserializationContext) throws IOException, JsonProcessingException {
217                String value = jsonParser.getText();
218                return Converter.parseDateTimeString(value);
219            }
220        });
221        mapper.registerModule(module);
222        reader = mapper.readerFor(Coordinate.class);
223        writer = mapper.writerFor(Coordinate.class);
224    }
225
226    private static ObjectReader getObjectReader() {
227        if (reader == null) {
228            instantiateMapper();
229        }
230        return reader;
231    }
232
233    private static ObjectWriter getObjectWriter() {
234        if (writer == null) {
235            instantiateMapper();
236        }
237        return writer;
238    }
239
240    private static JsonSchema defaultSchema() {
241        JsonSchemaFactory factory = JsonSchemaFactory.getInstance(SpecVersion.VersionFlag.V7);
242        SchemaValidatorsConfig config = new SchemaValidatorsConfig();
243        config.setHandleNullableField(false);
244        return factory.getSchema(Converter.class.getResourceAsStream("/schema/mzqc_schema.json"), config);
245    }
246
247}
